location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'GENERAL MAP OF BAHRAIN ISLAND PERSIAN GULF.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprint on paper.Dimensions: 960 x 380mm, on sheet 1120 x 420mm.

mods.abstract: Map dated 1 June 1938, and revised 1947? [date illegible], produced by the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO).Shows settlements, BAPCO installations, company reservations, locations of oil wells, hydrology, vegetation, cultivation, utilities, and some indication of relief, explained in key provided in the lower left portion of the map.Includes (inset) 'Marine facilities at Sitra', and 'Muharraq Island' (no scale given).
